all-packages.description: SWF tags are grouped into packages according to the SWF version in which they were introduced.

package.name: com.swfwire.decompiler
package.shortDescription: High-level classes that provide the ability to read/write SWF files.

package.name: com.swfwire.decompiler.abc
package.shortDescription: High-level classes that provide the ability to read/write ABC data.

package.name: com.swfwire.decompiler.data.swf
package.shortDescription: Classes that provide the data structure for each SWF tag, arranged by the SWF version the tag was introduced.

package.name: com.swfwire.utils
package.shortDescription: Common utilities for logging and debugging.
